applicationsDescription: To use our applications you only need to create an account. The applications are completely free to use.
settingsDescription: Settings you change will be saved in your account settings.
themeDescription: Once you change theme, it will be applied to the whole application.
languageDescription: Once you change language, language will be applied to the whole application.
wishlistDescription: With this app you will be able to keep all you wishes from almost all stores in the world in a single place. Share the wishlist with your friends and family, and some of the wishes might be even fulfilled!
userHasNoWishes: This user has no wishes at the moment.
noWishes: You don't have any wish at the moment. Create your first wish by pasting product URL to the field above.
noSearchResults: We couldn't find anything for requested term.
notesDescription: App for storing your notes. Write down your thoughts, attach images, videos and keep everything into this rich text editor.
covid19Description: Latest information Corona virus status in Serbia, since the first confirmed case until today.
testedLast24h: Number of tested in the last 24h
registeredLast24h: Number of confirmed in the last 24h
hospitalizedLast24h: Number of hospitalized in the last 24h
deathsLast24h: Number of deaths in the last 24h
percentOfPositive: of the positive in the last 24h
name: Name
ambulancesDescription: Heath institutions operating in the COVID mode.
noAmbulances: Currently there's no ambulances in the COVID mode.
statisticDescription: Virus behavior over time shown through charts and cards.
airQualityDescription: Latest information about the air pollution in places where metric stations are currently installed.
noAirQualityData: Currently there's no air quality information
